case_details.law_section: 6-9(c) of Control of Narcotic Substances Act, 1997

allegations.complainant: Zaheer Ahmad, Sub-Inspector, C.I.A. Cantt., Lahore
allegations.details: Muhammad Asif was apprehended with 19,000 grams (19 Kgs) of Charas stored at Nisbat Road.

claims: Case registered with mala fide intention.
Application moved against Zaheer Ahmad to Anti-Corruption Punjab.
No evidence connecting petitioner to narcotics dealing.
Statement of co-accused has no evidentiary value.
Petitioner involved in 18 prior narcotics cases.

findings: Petitioner resides in the same house where narcotics were stored.
Material evidence collected against petitioner through son's statement.
Petitioner failed to prove false implication or mala fide intention.
judgment_summary.conclusion: No case for bail before arrest made out. Application dismissed.
